1.1.name: wordpress/cnhk-slideshow
1.1.description: Cnhk Slideshow is a slideshow plugin that uses jQuery cycle and is compatible with fluid width design. It uses an easy drag and drop system for managing slideshow. The plugin supports using multiple slideshows on the same page or post. Integration by shortcode, widget or template tag.
